channel.title: Standard question?
channel.description: I downloaded the deltascape source, and I can't find a run.bat file...how do I get it or make one? provide link for tutorial if exists.

item.title: Standard question?
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Yes it is kenneh. Do the same that x sam x said but use: @echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Standard question?
item.dc:creator: @Kenneh Kenneh
item.description:
@Kenneh wrote:

[quote=“x sam x, post:5, topic:381480”]make a new .txt file, (notepad). paste @echo off title Server name java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; pause
Click save as, then save as run.bat and all file types.[/quote]

I wonder if that is the PI run one.

Read full topic

item.title: Standard question?
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

make a new .txt file, (notepad). paste @echo off title Server name java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; pause
Click save as, then save as run.bat and all file types.

item.title: Standard question?

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

SO by run, the server starts?

item.title: Standard question?
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

[@echo off Title Super Compile-Runer @echo Your server is compiling... please wait. @echo After compiled press any key to start server! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause @echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server/code]
it compiles then runs…

Read full topic

item.title: Standard question?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Try this @echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title Your Server Here java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls This is an auto restarter but just save that into a batch file. I just pulled up my old delta source and it was there. Tell me if it dosent work.

Read full topic
